title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
**Breathe Easier with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier â€“ Your Solution for Comfort and Freshness!**

Introducing the sleek and stylish Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier in classic black, designed to enhance your living space while providing optimal humidity levels. With its generous 1-gallon tank capacity, this humidifier is engineered to cover an area of up to 320 square feet, ensuring your room is filled with refreshing, cool mist.

**Key Features:**
- **Vast Tank Capacity:** Enjoy long-lasting humidification with a 1-gallon tank that delivers a humidity capacity of 142ml per hour.
- **Effortless Operation:** With a simple mechanical knob and 3-speed settings, you can customize your comfort level with ease.
- **Smart Indicators:** Never run dry thanks to the low tank indicator, and stay protected with the empty tank protection feature.
- **Aroma Therapy:** Elevate your experience with the included aroma tray, perfect for adding your favorite essential oils.
- **Dishwasher Safe:** Maintenance is a breeze as this humidifier is designed to be dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.
- **Evaporative Technology:** Enjoy natural and safe humidification with the cool mist evaporative technology.
- **Filter Compatibility:** Compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, ensuring clean and fresh mist every time.
- **Portable Design:** Lightweight at just 6.33 lbs, it's easy to move wherever you need it most.

Whether you're looking to alleviate dry skin, soothe allergies, or simply create a more comfortable environment, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is your go-to solution. Its sleek black design fits any decor, while the whisper-quiet operation won't disturb your peace.

**Add a Breath of Fresh Air to Your Home Today with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier!**

**Experience Ultimate Comfort with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier**

Transform your living space into an oasis of comfort with the sleek and efficient Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Designed to cater to your needs, this 1-gallon black humidifier combines functionality with style, effortlessly blending into any room decor.

**Key Features:**

- **Generous Capacity:** With a 1-gallon tank, this humidifier is perfect for continuous use, efficiently hydrating a room up to 320 square feet.
- **Cool Mist Evaporative Technology:** Breathe easy with the cool mist that adds moisture to the air, helping to alleviate dry skin, sinus issues, and respiratory discomfort.
- **Intuitive Low Tank Indicator:** Never get caught off guard. The handy indicator alerts you when it's time to refill.
- **Dishwasher Safe:** Maintenance is a breeze with parts that are safe to clean in your dishwasher, ensuring a hygienic mist every time.
- **Customizable Output:** With a humidity capacity of 142ml/hour and three speed settings controlled by a classic mechanical knob, you have complete control over your environment.
- **Aroma Tray Feature:** Add a few drops of your favorite essential oils to the aroma tray, and indulge in a spa-like experience right at home.
- **Safe and Efficient:** Features like the empty tank protection automatically shut off the device when the water level is low, giving you peace of mind.
- **Compatible with BestAir H62 Filters:** Keep your air fresh and clean with easy-to-replace filters, ensuring long-lasting performance.

Weighing just 6.33 lbs, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is portable and convenient to move from room to room. Whether you're looking to improve your sleep quality, protect your wooden furniture from dry air, or simply create a more comfortable atmosphere, this humidifier is the perfect choice for any home.

Invest in your well-being today and enjoy the serene environment you deserve with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Your sanctuary awaits!

Experience a breath of fresh air with the sleek and efficient Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier - your perfect solution for maintaining a comfortable and healthy indoor atmosphere. Designed to blend seamlessly into any home or office setting with its elegant black finish, this 1-gallon capacity humidifier promises not only to enhance your environment but also to elevate your well-being.

**Breathe Easier with Every Mist**
Crafted with advanced cool mist evaporative technology, the Mainstays Humidifier efficiently adds moisture to the air, covering a generous area of up to 320 square feet. With a humidity output of 142 milliliters per hour, you'll swiftly notice an improvement in air quality, helping to relieve dry skin, allergies, and cold symptoms.

**Features Tailored to Your Convenience**
Convenience is king with a set of features designed to simplify your life:
- **Low Tank Indicator:** Never second-guess when it's time for a refill. The intuitive low tank indicator alerts you when water levels are low.
- **Dishwasher-Safe Components:** Cleaning is a breeze with dishwasher-safe parts, ensuring your humidifier remains hygienic and hassle-free.
- **Aroma Tray:** Indulge in a sensory retreat by adding your favorite essential oils to the integrated aroma tray, creating a restorative and personalized atmosphere.
- **Three Speed Settings:** Customize your comfort with three distinct speed settings, easily adjusted by a user-friendly mechanical knob.

**Safety & Maintenance**
Peace of mind is integral to the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, which incorporates essential safety features:
- **Empty Tank Protection:** The unit automatically shuts off when it detects an empty tank, preserving its longevity and your safety.
- **BestAir H62 Replacement Filter Compatibility:** Ensure optimal performance with readily available BestAir H62 replacement filters.

Weighing just 6.33 pounds, this compact powerhouse is a portable and practical addition to any room in need of moisture balance. Embrace the tranquility of a perfectly humidified space with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, where style meets substance in every soothing breath you take. 

**Transform your environment today and enjoy the serenity that comes with the perfect humidity levels, all at the twist of a knob.**
